scripts.prepare:dashboard_build: git submodule update --init && cd dashboard && npm i && cd .. && (rm -rf swiftwave_service/dashboard/www || true) && mkdir -p swiftwave_service/dashboard/www
scripts.build:dashboard: npm run prepare:dashboard_build && cd dashboard && npm run build:prod && cd .. && cp -r dashboard/dist/* swiftwave_service/dashboard/www/
